name: Bountiful Core
description:
End Phase: Deal 2 Dendro DMG
Usage(s): 1 (Can stack, max 3 stacks)
When you declare the end of your Round: If this summon has at least 2 Usage(s) remaining, deal 2 Dendro DMG. (Consumes Usage(s))
